title: Honeymoon Hotline
description: She was a Doctor of Love...Nevada Jones was used to dispensing advice to the lovelorn - only, this time it was a case of physician, heal thyself! Because even though she'd long ago decided that love was only for other people, hard-driving Chase McQuaid was the one man she'd never been able to forget....Who Had Never Been Kissed!Chase McQuaid was used to getting what he wanted - and sassy, redheaded talk-show host Nevada Jones definitely fell into that category. Now if only he could convince her to get off the airwaves...and into his arms!
author: Christine Rimmer
